WEATHER FORECAST FOR 19 NOVEMBER 2023
Issued at 12.00 noon on 18 November 2023
Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in most provinces of the island after
Heavy showers about 100 mm are likely at some places in Central, Uva and Sabaragamuwa
provinces.
Showers may occur at a few places in Western province and in Puttalam, Galle and Matara
districts during the morning too.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages
caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
Rainfall amount (mm): Light: 00-12.5, Light to moderate: 12.5-25, Moderate: 25-50, Fairly heavy rain: 50 -100,
Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
